markdownRemark.html:
Get Fucked

  1. To take into oneself the body of another
  2. To ascend to an altered/enlightened state
  3. A command to either improve oneself or remove oneself from a situation.

Get Fucked is a queer performance night in Neuk√∂lln, Berlin. It is organised and curated by her holiness, the first, last and eternal Olympia Bukkakis. Get Fucked aims to build a bridge between more traditional forms of queer nightlife performance (such as drag) and performers and artists from other disciplines.
